BG.name: Final Fight 2™
BG.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. Join Haggar and newcomers Maki and Carlos to take down the Mad Gear Gang once and for all! Take control of any of the three heroes and make use of their unique abilities in a fast-paced adventure which will take you to all locations of the globe. And you're not alone, either - you can also have a friend join the fight to bring an end to the Mad Gear Gang! This is the US version of the game.

AT.name: Final Fight 2™
AT.description: Die Mad Gear Gang ist zurück und auf Rache aus! Sie haben Guys Meister Genryusai und dessen Tochter Rena, Guys Verlobte, entführt. Ziehe mit Haggar und den neuen Charakteren Maki und Carlos los, um der Mad Gear Gang endgültig das Handwerk zu legen! Steuere einen der drei Helden und setze ihre einzigartigen Fähigkeiten ein, während du dich in diesem rasanten Abenteuer durch die ganze Welt kämpfst. Und du bist nicht allein auf dich gestellt – lade einen Freund ein, um den Kampf gegen die Mad Gear Gang gemeinsam ein für alle Mal zu Ende zu bringen! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CY.name: Final Fight 2™
CY.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. Join Haggar and newcomers Maki and Carlos to take down the Mad Gear Gang once and for all! Take control of any of the three heroes and make use of their unique abilities in a fast-paced adventure which will take you to all locations of the globe. And you're not alone, either - you can also have a friend join the fight to bring an end to the Mad Gear Gang! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Final Fight 2™
CA.description: It's been several years since peace settled in Metro City. With Cody and Jessica on vacation and Guy resuming his training out of town, everything seems to be in order. But recently, Haggar is feeling uneasy after learning that Mad Gear was not completely destroyed. Once again the Mad Gear Gang has emerged and this time they want revenge. They'll stop at nothing to bring Haggar and the entire world down to its knees. This time they've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai and his daughter, Rena. Now Haggar must travel the four corners of the globe to search for Genryusai and Rena. With the help of Maki and Carlos, the reign of the Mad Gear Gang will hopefully be destroyed.

BR.name: Final Fight 2™
BR.description: Passaram-se vários anos desde que a paz foi reinstaurada na cidade de Metro City. Cody e Jessica estão de férias e Guy está viajando em treinamento, e tudo parece estar em ordem. Mas Haggar anda preocupado, pois ficou sabendo que a gangue Mad Gear não foi completamente destruída. A gangue Mad Gear emergiu mais uma vez, e agora em busca de vingança. Eles farão de tudo para dominar Haggar e o mundo inteiro. Desta vez eles raptaram o mestre do Guy, Genryusai, e a sua filha Rena. Agora Haggar precisa viajar para os quatro cantos do mundo à procura de Genryusai e Rena. Se tudo der certo, com a ajuda de Maki e Carlos, a gangue Mad Gear será destruída.

BE.name: Final Fight 2™
BE.description: Le gang Mad Gear est de retour... et il veut sa revanche ! Ses membres ont enlevé le mentor de Guy, Genryusai, et sa fille Rena, qui est aussi la fiancée de Guy. Rejoignez Haggar et deux nouveaux guerriers, Maki et Carlos, pour mettre un terme aux agissements du gang Mad Gear une bonne fois pour toutes ! Choisissez un combattant et utilisez ses techniques spéciales dans une aventure trépidante aux quatre coins du monde. Vous pourrez même faire équipe avec un ami pour triomphez de vos ennemis ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Final Fight 2™
ES.description: Los Mad Gear han vuelto, ¡y tienen sed de venganza! Han secuestrado al maestro de Guy, Genryusai, y a su hija Rena, que es también la prometida de Guy. ¡Únete a Haggar y a los recién llegados Maki y Carlos para derrotar de una vez por todas a los Mad Gear! Ponte en la piel de cualquiera de los tres personajes y haz uso de sus distintas técnicas y habilidades en esta trepidante aventura a través de distintos rincones del mundo. Y no tienes por qué luchar solo; ¡puedes invitar a un amigo para combatir juntos a los Mad Gear! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

FI.name: Final Fight 2™
FI.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. GB.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. IT.name: Final Fight 2™
IT.description: La banda dei Mad Gear è tornata! Assetati di vendetta, questi loschi criminali hanno rapito Genryusai, il maestro di Guy, e sua figlia Rena, fidanzata del giovane combattente. Vesti i panni di Haggar o di uno dei due nuovi personaggi, Maki e Carlos, e spazza via la banda dei Mad Gear una volta per tutte! Scegli uno dei tre personaggi disponibili e sfrutta le tecniche speciali di ciascuno in questo picchiaduro mozzafiato che ti porterà in giro per il mondo. Rendi la sfida ancora più avvincente giocando con un amico e sbarazzatevi insieme della banda dei Mad Gear! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

PT.name: Final Fight 2™
PT.description: Os Mad Gear Gang estão de regresso e sedentos de vingança! Raptaram o mestre de Guy, Genryusai, e a sua filha, Rena, que é também a noiva de Guy. Junta-te a Haggar e aos novatos Maki e Carlos e coloca um ponto final aos Mad Gear Gang de uma vez por todas! Controla um dos três heróis e utiliza as suas habilidades únicas numa aventura com um ritmo alucinante que te levará aos quatro cantos do globo. E não precisas de estar sozinho, um amigo poderá juntar-se à luta que terminará com os Mad Gear Gang! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

NO.name: Final Fight 2™
NO.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. Join Haggar and newcomers Maki and Carlos to take down the Mad Gear Gang once and for all! Take control of any of the three heroes and make use of their unique abilities in a fast-paced adventure which will take you to all locations of the globe. And you're not alone, either - you can also have a friend join the fight to bring an end to the Mad Gear Gang! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Final Fight 2
MX.description: Han pasado varios años desde que la paz volvió a Metro City. Todo parece estar en orden: Cody y Jessica se encuentran de vacaciones y Guy ha decidido seguir entrenando en otra ciudad. Pero desde que se enteró de que la banda Mad Gear no fue destruida completamente, Haggar no puede dejar de pensar que algo anda mal. Y con justa razón, Mad Gear ha regresado en busca de venganza y no se detendrán ante nada hasta tener a Haggar, y a todo el mundo, a sus pies. Esta vez han secuestrado al maestro de Guy, Genryusai, y a su hija Rena. Con la ayuda de Maki y Carlos, Haggar deberá viajar por todo el mundo para rescatarlos y acabar con el reinado de terror de Mad Gear.

RU.name: Final Fight 2™
RU.description: Банда Mad Gear Gang вернулась, чтобы отомстить! На этот раз коварные бандиты похитили учителя Guy — мастера Genryusai — и его дочь Rena, с которой Guy помолвлен. Haggar, Maki и Carlos отправляются в путь, чтобы спасти заложников. Пора разобраться с Mad Gear Gang раз и навсегда! Вы можете управлять любым из трех героев. Используйте их уникальные способности, чтобы выполнять опасные миссии во всех уголках земного шара. К тому же, вам не придется сражаться с Mad Gear Gang в одиночку! Пригласите в игру друга и вместе восстановите справедливость! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

NL.name: Final Fight 2™
NL.description: De Mad Gear Gang is terug en ze zint op wraak! Ditmaal hebben ze Guy's meester Genryusai en zijn dochter Rena, tevens verloofde van Guy, ontvoerd. Schaar je aan de zijde van Haggar en nieuwkomers Maki en Carlos om de Mad Gear Gang voorgoed uit te schakelen! Bestuur elk van de drie helden en gebruik hun unieke vaardigheden terwijl je de wereld rondreist. En je staat er niet alleen voor, want een vriend kan meedoen om samen met jou de Mad Gear Gang te verslaan! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Final Fight 2™
NZ.description: The Mad Gear Gang has returned, and they’re out for revenge! They've kidnapped Guy's master, Genryusai, and his daughter, Rena, who is also Guy's fiancée. Join Haggar and newcomers Maki and Carlos to take down the Mad Gear Gang once and for all! Take control of any of the three heroes and make use of their unique abilities in a fast-paced adventure which will take you to all locations of the globe.
